venue.name: Middlesex Fells - Off RT 28 Sheepfold Parking Area

item.description:
What does a snowboard addict do when there is no decent snow?  hike to get in shape for the season!

 I will lead a short, beginner hike lasting about 3 to 4 miles at the scenic Fells Reservation, just north of Boston (close to route 93). The trail will wind up and down with some rock scrambles but there are no sustained uphills. I suggest hiking shoes, jacket, snacks and plenty of water. Weather should be nice but at this time of year it is always a good idea to dress in layers.

If your Sunday plans include watching the Patriots this should be compatible, we will finish before 1pm kick-off.

We will meet at the Sheepfold parking lot at 9am sharp on Saturday morning. For Map of the Fells Reservation check out: http://www.mass.gov/dcr/parks/metroboston/maps/fells.gif

The Sheepfold is just about the center of the Fells reservation.
item.how_to_find_us: We will be at the trail map at the far end of the top most parking area, close to the field.
item.name: Hike the Fells
